products.name: YC FACIUM Glutathione Brightening Face Wash
products.shortDescription: Unlock Radiant Skin with our Triple-Power Formula featuring Glutathione, Kojic Acid & Vitamin C.
products.longDescription: YC FACIUM Glutathione Brightening Face Wash is a revolutionary skincare product that combines the power of three potent ingredients to deliver comprehensive skin benefits. Our Triple-Power Formula features Glutathione for antioxidant protection and skin brightening, Kojic Acid for reducing hyperpigmentation, and Vitamin C for boosting collagen production and enhancing skin radiance. This advanced face wash is designed to transform your skincare routine and unlock your skin's natural glow.
features: Triple-Power Formula with Glutathione, Kojic Acid & Vitamin C
Boosts collagen production for firmer skin
Comprehensive skin benefits in one face wash

image.alt: YC FACIUM Glutathione Brightening Face Wash - Yevacure Pharmaceutical

products.usage: Massage onto damp skin in gentle circular motions for 30-60 seconds, rinse with lukewarm water. Use twice daily - morning and evening for best results. Follow with your regular moisturizer and sunscreen during the day.
benefits: Brightens skin tone and reduces dark spots
Comprehensive skin benefits in one product
products.warnings: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, discontinue use and consult a dermatologist. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place. Use sunscreen during the day as Vitamin C may increase sun sensitivity.

compliance.storage: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight
